name: Sagarjoglekar.GitHub.io
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub page 
I am a King's India scholar at King's College London. I am working towards my Ph.D. in computer science at department of Natural and Mathematical Sciences at King's college, under the advice of [Dr. Nishanth Sastry](http://www.inf.kcl.ac.uk/staff/nrs/) . My primary interests are complex networks and and their emergent behaviours. I am currently working on expression analysis in social videos using several machine learning and inference methods.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
